tool_description: This api will get a news from nytimes.com with query
name: Nytimes News
title: Nytimes News

api_list.name: Get news with query
api_list.description: This endpoint will get news from nytimes using a query
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nytimes-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/Russia"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nytimes-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nytimes-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{news_name_to_search}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nytimes-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
